thumb.name: Always an Adventure! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStay Tuned.%3Cbr%3E Alex...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...for more exciting adventures%3Cbr%3Eof the Alex and Morgan show!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBeing friends with you%3Cbr%3Eis always an adventure!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Friendship%26#146;s Bloom
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;Friendship%26#146;s bloom%3Cbr%3Eunfolds with sharing.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe share so much%3Cbr%3Eas friends. Connie %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ethanks for being%3Cbr%3Ea very special part%3Cbr%3Eof my life.%3Cbr%3E
